Movie & Dining: Buy One Get One Offer on BookMyShow (Capped at ₹700). ₹3,000 Voucher from EazyDiner (Twice Each Year)
Rewards Rate: 1.5 Reward Points for every Rs. 100 spent using the card
Reward Redemption: Reward Points Redeemable Against Cash Credit, IndusMoments, or KrisFlyer Miles
Domestic Lounge Access: 6 complimentary domestic lounge access per quarter under the Visa Lounge program
International Lounge Access: Four Complimentary International Lounge Access Using Priority Pass
Golf: Unlimited Golf Games at Regular Clubs and 4 Free Golf Games (Per Month) at Premium Clubs
Insurance Benefits: Personal air-accident insurance worth Rs. 2.5 crores

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Annual Fee Waiver on Spends of ₹10 Lakh Each Year
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge is waived for transactions between Rs. 400 and Rs, 4,000.

product_details: First credit card in Indian sub-continent with pure 22K gold inlay.
1.5 Reward Points for every Rs. 100 spent using the card.
Reward Points redeemable against Airmiles, cash credit, or IndusMoments.
Complimentary domestic and international lounge access.
Buy One Get One offer on movie tickets & discount on non-movie tickets on BookMyShow.
Unlimited complimentary access to golf games at selected golf courses.
A lower interest rate of 1.79% per month.
Personal air accident cover worth Rs. 2.5 crores.
Lost card liability protection from up to 48 hours prior to the time of reporting the loss of card.
